# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2025-11-08

### Added
- Initial release of numgraph
- Core equation parsing using sympy
- Graph building with networkx
- Interactive visualization with pyvis
- Static plotting with matplotlib
- Export to GraphML and GEXF formats
- Function plotting with range support
- Main API function `make_graph()`
- Example scripts for circle equation and quadratic function
- Comprehensive test suite
- Documentation and README

### Features
- Parse mathematical equations into graph structures
- Visualize variable and operator relationships
- Support for equations with '=' sign
- Support for standalone expressions
- Hierarchical graph layout
- Color-coded node types (variables, operators, constants)
- Interactive HTML visualizations
- Static PNG exports

[0.1.0]: https://github.com/Ayush-07-Mishra/numgraph/releases/tag/v0.1.0
